tool-description: Contains a summary of key project points automatically generated.
A schedule of one single day that lists activities and their specific timings.
A checklist or binary task list used to track completion status (done/pending) of items.
A steps list that defines a sequential, ordered set of steps required to complete a process.
A team list detailing team members and their assigned roles or responsibilities.
A supplies list or inventory that details required materials or items.
A list of search terms or relevant topics/keywords for further research or investigation.
A timeline or chronological overview highlighting key milestones, events, or phases of a project.
